user_prompt: Write xUnit test classes for my order processing service with Theory attributes and InlineData for boundary cases.
Define my overall test strategy including unit vs integration vs E2E ratios and what to mock at each layer.
Build WebApplicationFactory-based integration tests that replace the database with an in-memory provider and assert HTTP responses.
Set up Verify snapshot tests to capture complex DTO serialization output and use the approval workflow.
Improve my test suite quality with better assertions, reduce flaky tests, and add mutation testing metrics.
Create a Fact and Theory-based xUnit test that verifies my repository pattern works with EF Core InMemory.
Audit my ASP.NET API for OWASP Top 10 vulnerabilities including SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF.
Implement API rate limiting, CORS policies, and authentication middleware to secure my REST endpoints.
Set up user secrets for local dev, Azure Key Vault for production, and environment-based configuration providers.
Implement AES encryption for data at rest, SHA-256 hashing for passwords, and RSA signing for JWT tokens.
Review my .NET API for broken authentication, insecure deserialization, and security misconfiguration vulnerabilities.
Write EF Core queries with AsNoTracking, split queries, compiled queries, and pagination for my reporting module.
Design the EF Core architecture with DbContext lifetime management, repository pattern, and unit of work.
Choose between EF Core, Dapper, and raw ADO.NET for different data access scenarios in my application.
Configure EF Core migrations, seeding, and connection resiliency for my multi-tenant database setup.
Implement the repository pattern with generic base class and specification pattern for my EF Core data layer.
Write BenchmarkDotNet benchmarks comparing Span-based and string-based parsers with memory allocation diagnostics.
Reduce allocations in my hot path using Span, stackalloc, ArrayPool, and value types instead of classes.
Profile my application using dotnet-trace and dotnet-counters to find CPU hotspots and memory allocation sites.
Tune the garbage collector for my high-throughput server with GC mode, heap sizes, and generation thresholds.
Identify and fix performance regressions by benchmarking before and after with statistical comparison.
Create minimal API endpoints with route groups, TypedResults, and endpoint filters for my product catalog.
Implement URL-based and header-based API versioning using Asp.Versioning for my REST API.
Generate OpenAPI 3.0 specification with schema annotations, operation descriptions, and Swagger UI integration.
Add FluentValidation rules for request DTOs with async validators, custom rules, and error message localization.
Design minimal API endpoints with versioned route groups and OpenAPI metadata for auto-generated documentation.
Set up a GitHub Actions workflow template for .NET with best practices for caching, matrix builds, and reusable workflows.
Build a GitHub Actions CI pipeline that restores, builds, tests, and uploads test results on every PR.
Create a GitHub Actions workflow to publish my .NET library as a NuGet package to nuget.org on release tags.
Set up a GitHub Actions deployment pipeline to Azure App Service with staging slots and approval gates.
Configure reusable GitHub Actions workflows for .NET with shared build steps and environment-specific deployment jobs.
Build a reusable Blazor component library with parameters, cascading values, and EventCallback patterns.
Design the overall Blazor app architecture with render modes, state management, and navigation patterns.
Implement authentication and authorization in my Blazor Server app with AuthenticationStateProvider and policy-based auth.
Write bUnit tests for my Blazor components with parameter injection, event triggering, and markup assertions.
Create a Blazor form component with EditForm, DataAnnotations validation, custom validators, and error display.
